io.parallec.core.task

Class ParallelTaskManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.parallec.core.task.ParallelTaskManager

  • public class ParallelTaskManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class to manage the current running tasks and wait queue. (Singleton) generateUpdateExecuteTask(io.parallec.core.ParallelTask) is the key function to execute a ParallelTask. It has access to the waiting task queue and the currently running map of ParallelTasks.
    Author:
    Yuanteng (Jeff) Pei, Teng Song
